name: Avoid undocumented Functions and Methods (Javascript/Typescript)
description: Functions and methods should be documented. This reports shows all functions, methods and constructors with no comments as soon as these objects contain at least one line of code.
output:
This rule lists all undocumented Functions, Methods and Constructors.
It provides following information:
- Object full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact.
remediation: Add comments into functions and methods to explain what is their goal and how they work.
total: Number of Functions, Methods and Constructors
alternativeName: Make sure to explain the goal, objective that a function achieves to improve its maintainability
